int get_dlink_offset ( int  dlink_type  ) 

It gets the dlink offset at which IP/ARP header is found depending on dlink type.

Greetz to evilsocket's IPGrep for this algorithm.

Parameters:
dlink_type Data link type, depending on the kind of interface used (ethernet, PPP, PPPoE, token ring, SLIP...) and known through pcap_datalink
Returns:
Data link offset

list get_tcpstream ( struct record  r,
int *  size 
)

It returns a linked list of packets belonging to a given TCP stream.

Parameters:
r Reference to the packet
size Reference to the variable that will contain the number of TCP packets belonging to the TCP stream of r
Returns:
List of packets belonging to r TCP stream
